citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:45 on 9/16/2025.
The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by upon arrival, and waited 30 min. The licensee responded
that she was out of the area and would not be home in a time for an inspection.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:45 on 9/16/2025. 
The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by upon arrival, and waited 30 min. The licensee responded 
that she was out of the area and would not be home in a time for an inspection.  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
